timeline.bodyText:
Why contains and not string equality here? For instance 140.0.0.0 contains 0.0.0.0 but I don't think we want to rewrite that to localhost.
Also, it would perhaps be marginally cleaner to only set a variable storing the cleaned host in the if block, and then build the URI based on that cleaned host?
timeline.author: wetneb

timeline.message:
fix: Browser redirection for 0.0.0.0

Signed-off-by: kushthedude <kushthedude@gmail.com>
